attributes.action: Fishing equates to 0.1% GDP. Sign a Brexit deal with 5 years status quo.
attributes.additional_details: Because the downside of a WTO Brexit outweighs the benefits to a tiny minority industry.
attributes.background: Fishing is not an industry, even with potential growth, equates to the downside of a WTO trade deal with the EU. Accept a 5 year status quo on access rights and quotas.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has agreed a deal with the EU regarding future relations, including on fisheries.

You can read the details of the deal here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/agreements-reached-between-the-united-kingdom-of-great-britain-and-northern-ireland-and-the-european-union
